verses.verse: 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "The gate <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> facing <S%H6437><s%> east <S%H6921><s%> shall be shut <S%H5462><s%> the six <S%H8337><s%> working <S%H4639><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> but it shall be opened <S%H6605><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and opened <S%H6605><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> of the new <S%H2320><s%> moon. <S%H2320><s%>

"And the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> by way <S%H1870><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> from outside <S%H2351><s%> and stand <S%H5975><s%> by the post <S%H4201><s%> of the gate. <S%H8179><s%> Then the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall provide <S%H6213><s%> his burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and his peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, <S%H8002><s%> and he shall worship <S%H7812><s%> at the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> and then go <S%H3318><s%> out; but the gate <S%H8179><s%> shall not be shut <S%H5462><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

"The people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall also worship <S%H7812><s%> at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of that gate <S%H8179><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> on the sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> and on the new <S%H2320><s%> moons. <S%H2320><s%>

"And the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be six <S%H8337><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish <S%H8549><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish; <S%H8549><s%>

and the grain offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be an ephah <S%H374><s%> with the ram, <S%H352><s%> and the grain offering <S%H4503><s%> with the lambs <S%H3532><s%> as much <S%H3027><s%> as he is able <S%H3027><s%> to give, <S%H4991><s%> and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> with an ephah. <S%H374><s%>

"And on the day <S%H3117><s%> of the new <S%H2320><s%> moon <S%H2320><s%> [he shall offer] a young <S%H1121><s%> bull <S%H6499><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish, <S%H8549><s%> also six <S%H8337><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> and a ram, <S%H352><s%> [which] shall be without <S%H8549><s%> blemish. <S%H8549><s%>

"And he shall provide <S%H6213><s%> a grain offering, <S%H4503><s%> an ephah <S%H374><s%> with the bull, <S%H6499><s%> and an ephah <S%H374><s%> with the ram, <S%H352><s%> and with the lambs <S%H3532><s%> as much <S%H3027><s%> as he is able, <S%H5381><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> with an ephah. <S%H374><s%>

"And when the prince <S%H5387><s%> enters, <S%H935><s%> he shall go <S%H935><s%> in by way <S%H1870><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> and go <S%H3318><s%> out by the same way. <S%H1870><s%>

"But when the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> at the appointed <S%H4150><s%> feasts, <S%H4150><s%> he who enters <S%H935><s%> by way <S%H1870><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> shall go <S%H3318><s%> out by way <S%H1870><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> gate. <S%H8179><s%> And he who enters <S%H935><s%> by way <S%H1870><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> shall go <S%H3318><s%> out by way <S%H1870><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate. <S%H8179><s%> No <S%H3808><s%> one shall return <S%H7725><s%> by way <S%H1870><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> he entered <S%H935><s%> but shall go <S%H3318><s%> straight <S%H3318><s%> out.
"And when they go <S%H935><s%> in, the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall go <S%H935><s%> in among <S%H8432><s%> them; and when they go <S%H3318><s%> out, he shall go <S%H3318><s%> out.

"And at the festivals <S%H2282><s%> and the appointed <S%H4150><s%> feasts <S%H4150><s%> the grain offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be an ephah <S%H374><s%> with a bull <S%H6499><s%> and an ephah <S%H374><s%> with a ram, <S%H352><s%> and with the lambs <S%H3532><s%> as much <S%H3027><s%> as one is able <S%H3027><s%> to give, <S%H4991><s%> and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> with an ephah. <S%H374><s%>

"And when <S%H3588><s%> the prince <S%H5387><s%> provides <S%H6213><s%> a freewill <S%H5071><s%> offering, <S%H5071><s%> a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> or <S%H176><s%> peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H8002><s%> [as] a freewill <S%H5071><s%> offering <S%H5071><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> facing <S%H6437><s%> east <S%H6921><s%> shall be opened <S%H6605><s%> for him. And he shall provide <S%H6213><s%> his burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and his peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H8002><s%> as he does <S%H6213><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%> Then he shall go <S%H3318><s%> out, and the gate <S%H8179><s%> shall be shut <S%H5462><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he goes <S%H3318><s%> out.

"And you shall provide <S%H6213><s%> a lamb <S%H3532><s%> a year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish <S%H8549><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> daily; <S%H3117><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning <S%H1242><s%> you shall provide <S%H6213><s%> it.

"Also you shall provide <S%H6213><s%> a grain offering <S%H4503><s%> with it morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning, <S%H1242><s%> a sixth <S%H8345><s%> of an ephah, <S%H374><s%> and a third <S%H7992><s%> of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> to moisten <S%H7450><s%> the fine <S%H5560><s%> flour, <S%H5560><s%> a grain offering <S%H4503><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> by a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> ordinance. <S%H2708><s%>

"Thus they shall provide <S%H6213><s%> the lamb, <S%H3532><s%> the grain offering, <S%H4503><s%> and the oil, <S%H8081><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning, <S%H1242><s%> for a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering. <S%H5930><s%>"

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "If <S%H3588><s%> the prince <S%H5387><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> a gift <S%H4979><s%> [out of] his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to any <S%H376><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> it shall belong <S%H1961><s%> to his sons; <S%H1121><s%> it is their possession <S%H272><s%> by inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

"But if <S%H3588><s%> he gives <S%H5414><s%> a gift <S%H4979><s%> from his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of his servants, <S%H5650><s%> it shall be his until <S%H5704><s%> the year <S%H8141><s%> of liberty; <S%H1865><s%> then it shall return <S%H7725><s%> to the prince. <S%H5387><s%> His inheritance <S%H5159><s%> [shall be] only <S%H389><s%> his sons'; it shall belong <S%H1961><s%> to them.

"And the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall not take <S%H3947><s%> from the people <S%H5971><s%>'s inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> thrusting <S%H3238><s%> them out of their possession; <S%H272><s%> he shall give <S%H5157><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> inheritance <S%H5157><s%> from his own possession <S%H272><s%> so <S%H4616><s%> that My people shall not be scattered, <S%H6327><s%> anyone <S%H376><s%> from his possession. <S%H272><s%>"' "

Then he brought <S%H935><s%> me through the entrance, <S%H3996><s%> which <S%H834><s%> [was] at the side <S%H3802><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> into the holy <S%H6944><s%> chambers <S%H3957><s%> for the priests, <S%H3548><s%> which faced <S%H6437><s%> north; <S%H6828><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> [was] a place <S%H4725><s%> at the extreme <S%H3411><s%> rear <S%H3411><s%> toward the west. <S%H3220><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to me, "This <S%H2088><s%> is the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall boil <S%H1310><s%> the guilt <S%H817><s%> offering <S%H817><s%> and the sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> [and] where <S%H834><s%> they shall bake <S%H644><s%> the grain offering, <S%H4503><s%> in order that they may not bring <S%H3318><s%> [them] out into the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> to transmit <S%H6942><s%> holiness <S%H6942><s%> to the people. <S%H5971><s%>"

Then he brought <S%H3318><s%> me out into the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> and led <S%H5674><s%> me across <S%H5674><s%> to the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H4740><s%> of the court; <S%H2691><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> in every <S%H4740><s%> corner <S%H4740><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> [there was] a [ small] court. <S%H2691><s%>

In the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H4740><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> [there were] enclosed <S%H7000><s%> courts, <S%H2691><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> [cubits] long <S%H753><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> wide; <S%H7341><s%> these four <S%H702><s%> in the corners <S%H9525><s%> [were] the same <S%H259><s%> size. <S%H4060><s%>

And [there was] a row <S%H2905><s%> [of masonry] round <S%H5439><s%> about <S%H5439><s%> in them, around <S%H5439><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> of them, and boiling <S%H4018><s%> places <S%H4018><s%> were made <S%H6213><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the rows <S%H2918><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about. <S%H5439><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, "These <S%H428><s%> are the boiling <S%H1310><s%> places <S%H1004><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the ministers <S%H8334><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> shall boil <S%H1310><s%> the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>"
